alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 5:23PM CDT until April 12 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Winnebago County in east central Wisconsin... Northeastern Waushara County in central Wisconsin... Southeastern Waupaca County in northeastern Wisconsin... Western Outagamie County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waupaca, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oshkosh, Waupaca, New London, Fremont, Lake Poygan, Dale, Hortonville, Winneconne, Weyauwega and Royalton. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
